name: Orbital Abyss
description:
Created in under 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Shoot enemies and dodge bullets with the help of allies.

Controls
Movement: WASD, Arrow keys
Shoot: Left Mouse
Allies: E, R, F
Pause: Space

Credits
Programming: Kyota Poeti
Design: Kyota Poeti, Jaywo Quako, TLSD
Music - Jaywo Quako
Sound Effects - TLSD
